value:
$WmMEID_アスク兵,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|My Queen... Forgive me!
We couldn't stop, Fáf—$k$p$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_Normal,Face_Smile|Enough whimpering!$k$p$SspSE_BATTLE_STING1|$Fo500,255,0,0,150|$Fi500|$WmMEID_アスク兵,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|NYAAHH!$k$p$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMEID_ニザヴェリル兵,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|King Fáfnir? ...What are your
orders, sire?$k$p$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_Normal,Face|Rgh... Just defeat them!$k$p$EFace_Anger|Here...somewhere... Will we find
a hint to my past?$k$p

$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Fáfnir!$k$p$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_Normal,Face|...You, huh? And just what do you
plan to do?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Anger|What do we— This is our home!
What are YOUR plans?!$k$p$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_Normal,Face_Anger|...Silence! Your home will be mine
soon enough. I will do as I please!$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...Brother?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|What is it, Princess Reginn?$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Something is different...in a way
I've never seen before.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_09,0|$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Gyah!$k$p$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_Normal,Face_Smile2|Weaklings! Struggle all you want,
but your results will not change.$k$p$EFace_Anger|Even with the aid of Eitri and the
jötnar, THIS is all the strength
you are able to muster?$k$pIt seems I had more faith in you
than was deserved... I was a fool.$k$pIf you are merely a nuisance, I will
crush you beneath my heel here
and now!$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Brother, no!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|...No!$k$p$EFace_Anger|...$k$p$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_Normal,Face|You are so weak, you are beneath
my concern. Die as you will.$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Fáfnir... Why?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Wait! Fáfnir... If you go—$k$pMother!$k$p$Sbs150|
